record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - May 08, 2008)

[Page: H3309]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably absent from this Chamber today. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on rollcall votes 299, 300, 301, 302 and 303 and "no" on rollcall votes 298, 304 and 305.
